amendment.description: An amendment numbered 21 printed in the Congressional Record to limit Federal land from the plan if it would not provide a fair return taxpayers.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to limit Federal land from the plan if it would not provide a fair return for taxpayers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Levin amendment (A025) Failed by recorded vote: 210 - 222 (Roll no. 51).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A025) offered by Mr. Levin.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Levin amendment (A025) Failed by recorded vote: 210 - 222 (Roll no. 51).
